attributes.action: Activly promote and teach the Commonwealth and Britishness in all schools
attributes.additional_details: I feel that British values, British history and the Commonwealth are pushed to the side far too often in British classrooms. I'm fed up of being taught about World War II and Oliver Cromwell, what about all the great British inventions, the empire, Commonwealth, the Royal Navy and culture. It seems to cease to excist in schools, it should be put onto the national curriculum at once.
